name: Wolf's Escape
description:
Play as a recently turned werewolf being hunted by your own people.

Use WASD to move and SPACE to dodge. The facing direction is controlled by the mouse.

WIP

Credits:

Pranav S K: Programmer

Olivia Wertheimer: Level Design, Environment Art, Lighting art

Freddie Parker: Character and weapon design.

AdamAudio: Music and SFX
